title: (x) Rolling Stones script "Let's Spend" - hand lettered {Pieter}
content:
Hi

Can anyone identify this font for me?

cheers,  
Rich

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Lets\_Spend.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009105827/http:/typophile.com/files/Lets_Spend.jpg) | 54.91 KB |

 [‹ (x) "Ariel" 3D oblique slab serif - Profil (Decorated 035) {Tim D}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009105827/http:/typophile.com/node/17346 "Go to previous forum topic") [Pappadeaux ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009105827/http:/typophile.com/node/17337 "Go to next forum topic")
author: trajkov

comments.content: I think it’s not a font. It’s drawn by hand.

Doh! I should have realised it was hand-drawn. Thanks anyway – I found a font called [Spring Regular](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009105827/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterperfect/spring/regular/) that is suitably scrawly for the job in question.
